item.title: about putty auto close
item.description: Putty-auto-close may caused by server error like “too many logins to user 'xxx' “. You can fix it by these steps: login to server as admin vim /etc/security/limits.conf modify the limitation or add new one line as : @xxx hard maxlogins 100 and I’m sure you must have known what the xxx and 100 mean.
